title: APlusLift Falcon 2,600LB Electric Vehicle Battery Lift - EL-26HM
body_html:
All EV Lifts

  • 3 Year (36 Months) Warranty; 2600LB Heavy Duty

  • An Adjustable And Tilting Platform to Safely And Efficiently Remove and Install Electric Vehicle Battery Packs

  • Working Surface Size 68 9/16" L x 35 7/16" W with extension of 12 13/16" in length. Fit large-size loads.

  • Reserved holes (4" x 4") on Working Platform for Positioning and Fixing Components with Specialized Fixtures.

  • Dual-speed System for Fast and Precise Lifting

  • Quick, Precise and Quiet Operation by Stable Scissor Frame with Precise Pivot Shafts and Thicker Gauge Steel

  • 110V 60HZ Single Phase Motor

  • 24V Magnetic Remote control

  • Electrically Released Mechanical locking system

APlusLift Falcon EL-26HM 2600LB EV Battery Lift Table is one of the most professionally made lift tables for replacing batteries for electric vehicles. It includes two platforms with reserved holes (4" x 4"). It is built with quality materials and excellent workmanship. Every part is fully tested. Oil hose with double steel wire fabrications, which has passed pressure test under 40MPa, can work under twice the nominal working pressure without breakage. The lift table is comparable to those known high-end lift tables.

APlusLift Falcon EL-26HM 2600LB Electric Hydraulic EV Battery Lift Table is helpful to assemble and disassemble battery packs for electric vehicles and engine, gearbox, drive axle, fuel tank, suspension, bracket and chassis components for traditional vehicles.

Free shipping to lower 48 states with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Car lifts require on-site forklift (no liftgate). We strongly recommend against renting a forklift; expense not reimbursed. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Self Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $300 Discount): Las Vegas (NV)

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications

  • Installation Manual
  • Two Platforms. Working Platform(Suspending) + Lower Platform(Supporting)
  • Working Platform Size 68 9/16" L x 35 7/16" W
  • An extension of 12 13/16" in length
  • Working Platform tilting within 1 5/8" (40mm)
  • Lower Platform moving within 13/16" (20mm)
  • Working Platform includes two sub-platforms
  • Sub-platform A 31 1/8" L x 31 1/2" W
  • Sub-platform B 36 1/4" L x 31 1/2" W
  • 4" x 4" (100mm x 100mm) Reserved holes on Working Platform
  • Maximum Lifting Height (to table top): 71 1/4"
  • Lowered Height (to table top): 31 1/2"
  • Overall Length without handle: 92 11/16"
  • Overall Length with handle: 119"
  • Overall Width: 35 7/16"
  • Castor size: D8"
  • Weight Capacity: 2,600 LB
  • Electrical Requirements: 110V, 60HZ, Single Phase
  • Electrical Cable Length: 23 ft
  • Hydraulic Oil NOT Included
  • Lift Table Color RAL 7021 (Gray) + Scissor Frame Color RAL 2004 (Orange)
  • Shipping Weight: 1900LB
  • Shipping Dimension: 88"L x 41"W x 29"H

Features

  • Tiltable Load-carrying Platform.
  • Dividable Working Platforms with an extension to Fit large-sized loads.
  • Locking knobs on the Lower Platform.
  • Greaseable shaft. Grease zerks on axle maintains smooth rolling action.
  • Pallet Jack with Large Castors. Movable on ground easily.
  • Enhanced rack under main table. 7 position safety locking system: secures lift in place while working.
  • 24V Magnetic Remote control.
  • Electrically Released Mechanical locking system.
  • Built-in Power Unit. 110V, 60HZ, Single Phase
  • Option adapters available.

All EV Lifts
